title: Unaired Pilot
episode_desc: Invalided home from the war in Afghanistan, Dr. John Watson becomes roommates with the world's only "consulting detective," Sherlock Holmes. Within a day their friendship is forged and several murders are solved.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: A Study in Pink
episode_desc: War vet Dr. John Watson returns to London in need of a place to stay. He meets Sherlock Holmes, a consulting detective, and the two soon find themselves digging into a string of serial "suicides."
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Blind Banker
episode_desc: Mysterious symbols and murders are showing up all over London, leading Sherlock and John to a secret Chinese crime syndicate called Black Lotus.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Great Game
episode_desc: Mycroft needs Sherlock's help, but a remorseless criminal mastermind puts Sherlock on a distracting crime-solving spree via a series of hostage human bombs through which he speaks.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: A Scandal in Belgravia
episode_desc: Sherlock must confiscate something of importance from a mysterious woman named Irene Adler.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Hounds of Baskerville
episode_desc: Sherlock and John investigate the ghosts of a young man who has been seeing monstrous hounds out in the woods where his father died.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Reichenbach Fall
episode_desc: Jim Moriarty hatches a mad scheme to turn the whole city against Sherlock.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: Many Happy Returns
episode_desc: John and Lestrade try to move on with their lives after Sherlock's apparent death. However, Anderson believes he is still alive.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Empty Hearse
episode_desc: Mycroft calls Sherlock back to London to investigate an underground terrorist organization.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Sign of Three
episode_desc: Sherlock tries to give the perfect best man speech at John's wedding when he suddenly realizes a murder is about to take place.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: His Last Vow
episode_desc: Sherlock goes up against Charles Augustus Magnussen, media tycoon and a notorious blackmailer.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Abominable Bride
episode_desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson find themselves in 1890s London in this Christmas special.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Six Thatchers
episode_desc: Sherlock takes on the case of finding out who is going around and smashing six unique head statues of late Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Lying Detective
episode_desc: Sherlock goes up against the powerful and seemingly unassailable Culverton Smith - a man with a very dark secret indeed.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Final Problem
episode_desc: A dark secret in the Holmes family rears its head with a vengeance, putting Sherlock and friends through a series of sick, manipulative psychological and potentially fatal games.
show_desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.
